name: Asylum - 13 (Thirteen) - Medulla Oblongata Maduro - 50X5
additionalNotes: Today, we’re staring down the barrel of the Maduro follow-up to the Medulla Oblongata, and it’s a most tasty treat indeed. Stepping up the cigar in terms of body and flavor, each one of these handmades booms out thick notes of black pepper, leather, espresso, and earth. Plus, each box features a 50/50 split of half round cigars and half box-pressed ones, allowing you to experience two uniquely nuanced versions of this showcase cigar.
